Magnificent stuff.  Please ignore Athlonite; he is an idiot.  HDTV didn't exist in 1966, doooood.
Seeding as I type.  Could we be seeing Seasons 2 & 3 in the future?  That would only be logical.  And fascinating.

[Could we be seeing Seasons 2 & 3 in the future?]
It possible.

For anyone considering downloading this 2 words - Don\'t Hesistate!rnrnThe quality of this goes beyond the 10/10 scale.  Multiple scenes have been deleted and then recreated with extreme attention to detail.  To give just one (of many examples) in the episode \"Tomorrow is Yesterday\" where originally they used a poor quality model of the Enterprise in Earth\'s atmosphere they now use high quality CGI.  In other episodes the Enterprise and other ships have been recreated with details.  As a long time trekkie this is the mother load.  rnrnEAGERLY looking forward to Season 2 and Season 3.   Reliant1 you rock dude!!!!  Thank you.  My first post wasn\'t adequate once I watched these.  I will be seeding for weeks.
